biography.bio: Simon Lui was born on July 8, 1964 in Hong Kong. He is an actor and writer, known for Ching ham baak lok moon (2000), Troublesome Night (1997) and Gui qing ni di hu (1999).
biography.name: Simon Lui

biography.bio: Born in Shanghai, China, as Pinyin Chen Baolian, Pauline Chan emigrated to Hong Kong at age 12 with her mother when her parents divorced. A beautiful young girl, it didn't take long for photographers and agents to notice her and she began modeling at 15. In 1990 she entered the Miss Asia beauty pageant. She didn't win, but her striking looks, lithe body and classy bearing attracted the attention of several producers in Hong Kong's adult film industry. At age 18 she made her adult-film debut and her enthusiastic performances shot her to the top of the Chinese porn field. In 1997 she hooked up with a much older man, a Taiwanese millionaire, and they had a short (two-year) but stormy relationship. After their break-up in 1999, Chan's personal and professional lives began to unravel. She had had a drug problem for several years and it got worse--during one television interview in which she was apparently high on drugs she actually tried to commit suicide. A series of brushes with the law ensued, resulting in her being deported from several countries, and she was briefly sent to prison in the UK for assault. These and other incidents pretty much pulled the plug on her film career. She moved back to her hometown of Shanghai and in July of 2002 gave birth to a baby boy. Motherhood didn't solve her problems, however, and on July 31, 2002, she leaped out of the window of her 24th-floor apartment and plunged to her death.
biography.name: Pauline Chan

biography.bio: Pinky Cheung was born on September 30, 1971 in Hong Kong, British Crown Colony as Cheung Man-Chi. She is an actress, known for The Merger (2015), Colour of the Truth (2003) and Chi meng sing siu yiu (2002).
biography.name: Pinky Cheung

biography.bio: Tat-Ming Cheung was born on July 2, 1964 in Hong Kong, British Crown Colony. He is an actor and writer, known for Espion amateur (2001), You Shoot, I Shoot (2001) and Forbidden City Cop (1996).
biography.name: Tat-Ming Cheung

biography.bio: Ada Choi was born on September 17, 1973 in Hong Kong. She is an actress, known for Fist of Legend (1994), Le roi singe 2 - Cendrillon (1995) and Empresses in the Palace (2011). She has been married to Jin Zhang since January 12, 2008. They have two children.
biography.name: Ada Choi

biography.bio: Jason Chu is an actor, known for Young and Dangerous 3 (1996), Young and Dangerous (1996) and Young and Dangerous 2 (1996).
biography.name: Jason Chu

biography.bio: Yiu-Cheung Lai was born on May 4, 1964 in Hong Kong, British Crown Colony. He is an actor, known for Filatures (2007), Dog Bite Dog (2006) and The Detective (2007). He has been married to Julia Leung since 1997. They have one child.
biography.name: Yiu-Cheung Lai

biography.bio: Sammuel Leung was born on December 3, 1973 in Hong Kong. He is an actor and composer, known for Beast Cops (1998), Shou xing xin ren lei (2000) and That Demon Within (2014).
biography.name: Sammuel Leung

biography.bio: Lung Ti was born on August 19, 1946 in Guangdong Province, China as Tam Fu Wing. He is an actor and director, known for A Better Tomorrow (1986), The Legend of Drunken Master (1994) and A Better Tomorrow II (1987). He has been married to Min-Ming Tao since May 22, 1975. They have one child.
biography.name: Lung Ti

biography.bio: Fennie Yuen was born on September 15, 1970. She is an actress, known for Tai-Chi Master (1993), Une balle dans la tête (1990) and The Swordsman (1990).
biography.name: Fennie Yuen
